Text: RE TW informationSounds great Ill come to your office Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Wednesday November AM To Taylor Sarah Subject Re TW information ok Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet
TW financialsIgnore my message about the financials I found a copy

TW financialsTracy Do you have a cleancopy of the TW audited financials and the September unaudited Im sorry but mine have notes on them I would be happy to pick them up if you have them available Thank you Sarah Taylor

TW information Cc Tracy Over the past few weeks I have received a great deal of financial information Would you have time today to sit down for a few minutes with me and walk through what I have so I make sure that I dont miss anything when I sent the financial section to the data room Please call me when you have a moment and let me know if this would be possible Thank you for all of your help Sarah

RE Data RoomRod and crew In speaking with Jayshree I think Mitch and Jeff would like to divide the information into categories ie legal information environmental disclosures etc regulatory information financialaccounting I think we have a lot of this and I will try to get it organized any relevant tax information etc I know this is a lot but let me know what you think who I should coordinated with etc Thanks Sarah Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November PM To Fossum Drew Corman Shelley Geaccone Tracy Cc Taylor Sarah Subject Fw Data Room This is the crew Do we know what we need Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet Original Message From Taylor Sarah Sarah NRONcom To Hayslett Rod Rod NRONcom Sent Tue Nov Subject Data Room Rod I just spoke with Jayshree Jeff has requested that we have a data room by tomorrow night and I was wondering who I should I should contact in legal to coordinate this effort Let me know Thanks Sarah

TW info Cc Rod Per our conversations yesterday there is one other item that we would like to obtain the current percentage ROE and return on rate base allowed by FERC If there is someone in your organization that I can contact please let me know Thank you for all of your help I hope that you get to relax and enjoy at least some of your holiday Regards Sarah
correctionI figured out Red Rock I just forgot about the Oneok volumes Sorry

RE Transwestern information requestsI told Brent that Bill Spearys group had a copy but he said Bills people said they did not have the form I am sending Brent the form via UPS right now I am leaving the office to work from home Please call me on my cell if you need anything else Sarah Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Friday November PM To Taylor Sarah Subject Fw Transwestern information requests Here is the message Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet Original Message From To Hayslett Rod Rod NRONcom CC CarlOVevle CarlOVevle Sent Fri Nov Subject Transwestern information requests Rod As per our phone conversation the list of information we would like to have follows FERC Form s for the last three years Revenue breakdown Assumptions made for the contracted period as well as the time period beyond current contracts firminterruptible mix and volumes tariffs for each type of transportation contract A build up from contracts to the revenues in the model would be ideal As before compressor gas volumes and assumed sales prices for the projected years As before the story as it relates to CERAs view of the world Explicit calculation of rate base going forward Employee benefit plan information funding status return rates future liabilities Thanks Rod When you have a time in mind for a call to discuss the above list please contact Eric Fornell Home or myself Home Work Cell

Form Cc Brent I received your message last night I dont believe I have any questions right now Also I sent you the FERC Form via UPS yesterday If you dont receive it tomorrow please let me know I also got a hold of a copy of the and forms I will send them tomorrow Thanks Sarah

Projection Cc Rod Attached is the summary of the projection information Please review and let me know if it seems reasonable My only concern the revenue value I calculated for SJ does not match the value in the volume assumptions Thanks Sarah

Projected volumes and revenuesRod Please take a look at this and let me know if this is what you had in mind I only completed the revenue section for the WOT because the other three sections had prices that where not available Please review and let me know how you would like me to proceed Thanks Sarah
Form Cc Rod Jim Sanders gave me a copy of the and Form I plan to make a copy for us and send the originals to Brent tomorrow Please let me know if this is problem Thanks Sarah

TW revenue breakdown Cc Rod After reviewing the information you sent on Wednesday afternoon I am not certain I can break out the Red Rock revenues The RedRockExpansion bids appear to total which exceeds the capacity you mentioned I assume that the in the pitchbook is correct Please let me know if this is not right Also the finalTWrev spreadsheet is the information you included in the pitchbook correct If I sum the four tabs does that constitute all of the exisitng capacity Is there any expansion capacity Red Rock Gallup included Please let me know if I am not correctly interpreting the data Jayshree and I are meeting at am tomorrow if you would like to discuss We will also be on the call at am Thanks Sarah

RE Transwestern information requestsI have left messages with Jim Bob and Harry I will let you know if I hear anything Also do you have any idea on the timing of the additional volume information Thanks Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Friday November PM To Taylor Sarah Subject Fw Transwestern information requests Here is the message Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet Original Message From To Hayslett Rod Rod NRONcom CC CarlOVevle CarlOVevle Sent Fri Nov Subject Transwestern information requests Rod As per our phone conversation the list of information we would like to have follows FERC Form s for the last three years Revenue breakdown Assumptions made for the contracted period as well as the time period beyond current contracts firminterruptible mix and volumes tariffs for each type of transportation contract A build up from contracts to the revenues in the model would be ideal As before compressor gas volumes and assumed sales prices for the projected years As before the story as it relates to CERAs view of the world Explicit calculation of rate base going forward Employee benefit plan information funding status return rates future liabilities Thanks Rod When you have a time in mind for a call to discuss the above list please contact Eric Fornell Home or myself Home Work Cell

RE Additional TW information request Cc Rod Thank you the information I have quickly reviewed it and I believe we can determine the contracted capacity for Red Rock using this information but what is the total Red Rock capacity to determine Also have you had any luck finding the other information we discussed Jayshree and I are trying to get a sense of timing I will be in the office for a couple of hours but I will then be working from home I do not have a Blackberry so would you please call me if you send additional information Thank you Sarah work cell home Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Wednesday November PM To Desai Jayshree Cc Taylor Sarah Subject RE Additional TW information request I plan to work toMorrow some on the data and can hopefully get you something for friday I have some more data coming Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

FW Red Rock additionsOriginal Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Sunday November PM To Taylor Sarah Cc Desai Jayshree Subject RE Red Rock additions Importance High FYI This is my story for now but I think it explains the volumes and the rates as well as the revenue projections Please note we have found a bust in revenue This yields a higher answer without any additional volumes being used Original Message From Taylor Sarah Sent Sun PM To Hayslett Rod Cc Desai Jayshree Subject Red Rock additions Exisiting capacity projections w Red Rockxls

Transwestern Cc Rod I am working on formatting the information you provided I have a couple of questions first using the margin numbers in the CE I get a lower number than we calculated for contracted volumes in the spreadsheet you created yesterday I also want to ask you some questions regarding the segregation of existing Gallup and Red Rock Do you have any time tomorrow to sit down and walk through the numbers Thanks Sarah

RE Sarah Taylor Cc I think that will be fine I dont think it will take long Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November PM To Taylor Sarah Cc Campos Kathy Subject FW Sarah Taylor Can not do a unless we can get done before Message Sarah Taylor

CAPEX Cc Rod Would you please forward me the CAPEX numbers when Tracy emails them to you Jayshree indicated that she needs those numbers and it will be easier to send in soft form Also to confirm the numbers in the information you gave me are MM for this does not include Red Rock and in this includes MM for Red Rock I am assuming that on page three of the projections that really captures the operations numbers are in s not millions as noted above If this is true you have billion in operations CAPEX which I dont believe is true Let me know Thanks Sarah

Data RoomRod I just spoke with Jayshree Jeff has requested that we have a data room by tomorrow night and I was wondering who I should I should contact in legal to coordinate this effort Let me know Thanks Sarah

RE Data RoomRod and crew In speaking with Jayshree I think Mitch and Jeff would like to divide the information into categories ie legal information environmental disclosures etc regulatory information financialaccounting I think we have a lot of this and I will try to get it organized any relevant tax information etc I know this is a lot but let me know what you think who I should coordinated with etc Thanks Sarah Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November PM To Fossum Drew Corman Shelley Geaccone Tracy Cc Taylor Sarah Subject Fw Data Room This is the crew Do we know what we need Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet Original Message From Taylor Sarah Sarah NRONcom To Hayslett Rod Rod NRONcom Sent Tue Nov Subject Data Room Rod I just spoke with Jayshree Jeff has requested that we have a data room by tomorrow night and I was wondering who I should I should contact in legal to coordinate this effort Let me know Thanks Sarah

New YorkWe are all confirmed on Continental Flight departing IAH at pm this evening see schedule below Our confirmation numbers are the same as our previous tickets I will be sending you your individual confirmation shortly I have also spoken with the W hotel and we have reservations for this evening The hotel confirmation numbers also remain the same If any of this is a problem please call me or Linda at Travel Agency in the Park Thanks Sarah cell Original Message From Linda Harris mailto Sent Sunday November PM To Taylor Sarah Subject TAYLORSARAH K NOV ETKT PROCESSED Importance High DATE NOV SERVICE DATE FROM TO DEPART ARRIVE CONTINENTAL AIRLINES NOV HOUSTON TX NEWARK NJ P A CO Y SUN GBUSH INTERCO NEWARK INTL NOV TERMINAL C TERMINAL C NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING SEAT C NO SMOKING CONFIRMED TAYLORSARAH K HOTEL NOV W NEW YORK UNION SQUARE NOV PARK AVENUE SOUTH NEW YORK NY UNITED STATES OF AMERICA TELEPHONE FAX TELEX NONE CONFIRMATION SINGLE ROOM KING SIZE BED RATE COR USD PER NIGHT GUARANTEE GIVEN NONSMK KING ROOM TO AVOID BILLING CANCEL HRS PRIOR TO ARRIVAL Linda Harris International Agent direct line or ext direct fax

FW HAYSLETTROD NOV ETKT PROCESSEDOriginal Message From Linda Harris mailto Sent Sunday November PM To Taylor Sarah Subject HAYSLETTROD NOV ETKT PROCESSED Importance High AGENT GTLH BOOKING REF YMBXQ HAYSLETTROD EB ETKT RECEIPT DATE NOV SERVICE DATE FROM TO DEPART ARRIVE CONTINENTAL AIRLINES NOV HOUSTON TX NEWARK NJ P A CO Y SUN GBUSH INTERCO NEWARK INTL NOV TERMINAL C TERMINAL C NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING SEAT C NO SMOKING CONFIRMED HAYSLETTRODID HOTEL NOV W NEW YORK UNION SQUARE NOV PARK AVENUE SOUTH NEW YORK NY UNITED STATES OF AMERICA TELEPHONE FAX TELEX NONE CONFIRMATION SINGLE ROOM KING SIZE BED RATE COR USD PER NIGHT GUARANTEE GIVEN NONSMK KING ROOM TO AVOID BILLING CANCEL HRS PRIOR TO ARRIVAL CONTINENTAL AIRLINES NOV NEW YORK NY HOUSTON TX P P CO Y TUE LA GUARDIA GBUSH INTERCO TERMINAL M TERMINAL C SNACK NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING SEAT E NO SMOKING CONFIRMED HAYSLETTRODID MISCELLANEOUS MAR HOUSTON TX WED THANK YOU FOR USING THE TAP RESERVATION NUMBERS COUKLE HAYSLETTROD SCR TICKET CO FREQUENT FLYER COBS ASSISTANT KATHY CAMPOS NEW FAA REQUIREMENTS CHECK IN AT LEAST HOURS PRIOR TO FLIGHT DEPARTURE FOR DOMESTIC HOURS FOR INTERNATIONAL TO GO THROUGH SECURITY YOU ARE REQUIRED TO HAVE AN ITINERARY GENERATED BY AN AIRLINE OR TRAVEL AGENCY CONFIRMING AN ELECTRONIC TICKET INCLUDING TICKET NUMBER OR A RECEIPT FOR AN ELECTRONIC TICKET INCLUDING TICKET NUMBER ANDOR A BOARDING PASS FOR THE CURRENT DAY THIS IS THE PASSENGER RECEIPT FOR YOUR ELECTRONIC TICKET PLEASE CHECKIN WITH PHOTO IDENTIFICATION AND WITH ITHER THIS RECEIPT OR YOUR CONFIRMATION NUMBER YOUR ETKT CONFIRMATION NUMBER IS UKLE SEATS ARE AWFULLTRY TO GET BETTER ONES BUT FLIGHTS ARE FULL Linda Harris International Agent direct line or ext direct fax

RE Highland Cc exactly what I needed Thanks Original Message From Boyt Eric Sent Thursday April AM To Taylor Sarah Cc Weldon V Charles Subject Re Highland Hope this helpsThe results box is our model with last years pricing Eric From Sarah nronXgate on AM To Eric nron cc Subject Highland Eric I am preparing my presentation for Jean and John and I have one quick question You indicated the average gas price was Yesterday you also mentioned how that valuation would have changed if it would have been calculated last April Do you know what the average price would have been if calculated last April I think this would help put things in perspective Thanks Sarah
RE Highland Cc Charlie I just wanted to let you know we met with Jean We determined an initial value and John is contacting Entergy today Thanks for all of your help Sarah

RE Highland Cc exactly what I needed Thanks Original Message From Boyt Eric Sent Thursday April AM To Taylor Sarah Cc Weldon V Charles Subject Re Highland Hope this helpsThe results box is our model with last years pricing Eric From Sarah nronXgate on AM To Eric nron cc Subject Highland Eric I am preparing my presentation for Jean and John and I have one quick question You indicated the average gas price was Yesterday you also mentioned how that valuation would have changed if it would have been calculated last April Do you know what the average price would have been if calculated last April I think this would help put things in perspective Thanks Sarah
RE Highland Cc Charlie I just wanted to let you know we met with Jean We determined an initial value and John is contacting Entergy today Thanks for all of your help Sarah
RE Highland Cc Charlespst Eric and Charlie I just wanted to let you know we met with Jean We determined an initial value and John is contacting Entergy today Thanks for all of your help Sarah
